snippet.title: Lifeling - Official Trailer
snippet.description:
The official trailer of the game Lifeling. I threw it together in like a week and a half.
Hope you like it!

Lifeling is the story of Noah, a boy from a barren post apocalyptic world. Noah leaves his safe hidings and ventures to an ancient forgotten place, looking for answers underground. On the way he flees from dangerous enemies and makes strange allies.

The Trailer was made using: Adobe After Effects, Photoshop, Premiere and Audition.
The Score was made with Audition and Garage Band using some digital strings, an acoustic piano and some guitars played with a violin bow.

Gamelink:  https://gamejolt.com/games/Lifeling/321445
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Lifeling-2023031761296826
